entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023
